page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ....
page.content: "Friday. I wake up at about 07.00 hrs. After I have had a wash I get ready for school. For breakfast I have cornflakes and toast. I leave my house at 07.50hrs and walk to the bus stop to wait for the bus which arrives at about 08.10hrs. When I arrive at school I wait at the classroom door for the bell to go. After that my teacher calls the register. Then we line up for Assembly. Afterwards I go to my first lesson which is 'Home and Family Studies', where we do cooking or writing. After that lesson it is break, followed by Science. We work from books called "Measurement". After dinner I have spellings followed by reading. Then it is Drama and Music. I like Drama best because you can act. At 15.35 hrs. I catch a bus home. After tea I play or do my homework."
